lang_data.G: Food and beverage available for purchase
lang_data.link_correspondence: Your correspondence with our support team
lang_data.name: Name
lang_data.cancel_question: Do you really want to cancel your reservation?
lang_data.cancel_successful: Your reservation is successfully cancelled. You can book new flight here: www.sky-tours.com
lang_data.cancel_unsuccessful: Sorry your reservation is not cancelled.
lang_data.cancel_no_because_of_payment: Dear client, due to the payment method chosen by you, unfortunately, your booking can not be cancelled online or free of charge. Please contact our support team via customer support to request a manual change or cancellation of your reservation.
lang_data.baggage_notice: Contact airline to confirm baggage allowance.
lang_data.notice:
1. Positive Identification required at Check-In.
2. The Electronic Ticket Record will not reflect flight reservation changes, schedule changes, or cancellations made after the electronic ticket was issued. For complete and current flight information, please refer to your ViewTrip Itinerary.
3. The Electronic Ticket Record may not meet all the requirements for receipts worldwide.
4. Terms/Conditions of Travel and Carrier Liability Notices can be requested from The Travel Agency or the Transporting Carrier.
lang_data.error_invalid_trip: ERROR: Invalid Trip Locator or Name. Please try again.
lang_data.error_not_reservation: ERROR: Your reservation is not in our database. Please contact the site where you have booked your flight.
lang_data.error_problem_reservation: ERROR: There is a problem with your reservation. It is declined or incomplete. Please contact Skytours Support team.
lang_data.error_unconfirmed: ViewTrip has recognized a flight schedule change; therefore, unable to display your itinerary, please contact our support service.
lang_data.error_cancel: Sorry your ticket is already issued. Free online cancellation no longer available. Please contact our customer support for cancellation subject to airlines cancellation/change fee.
lang_data.unconfirmed: Unconfirmed flight: Flight time and other information may be changed
